definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
Than Shwe (1933-), Myanmar general and politician, president of Myanmar 1992-2011

sentences.english: The Anfield boss believes the trio's return will keep everyone in his squad on their toes.
sentences.chinese: 貝帥相信三員大將的迴歸將給全隊注入一針強心劑。

sentences.english: Vice Snr-Gen Maung is a real soldier and a battle-oriented person.
sentences.chinese: 孟誒副大將是一個真正的軍人，以戰場爲生。

sentences.english: Brinell hardness will be 223 maximum with a spheroidized structure.
sentences.chinese: 布氏硬度最大將達到223，具有球化結構。

sentences.english: The younger Kim was commissioned a four-star general in North Korea's armed forces on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 同時與本週四金正銀又被授銜爲朝鮮軍隊四星大將。

sentences.english: He is a very experienced general and has made great contributions in battles.
sentences.chinese: 他是名久經沙場的大將軍，戰功赫赫。

sentences.english: Arsenal can today confirm the signing of midfielder Amaury Bischoff.
sentences.chinese: 阿森納可以證實，今天簽署了中場大將比肖夫。

sentences.english: He makes himself Shogun, or "commander-in-chief for suppressing barbarians".
sentences.chinese: 他自封幕府將軍“徵夷大將軍”。

sentences.english: Whenever Vice Snr-Gen Maung Aye wants to see Snr-Gen Than Shwe, he needs permission first.
sentences.chinese: 每當孟誒副大將希望會見丹瑞大將，他需要許可。

sentences.english: Whenever Vice Snr-Gen Maung Aye wants to see Snr-Gen Than Shwe, he needs permission first.
sentences.chinese: 每當孟誒副大將希望會見丹瑞大將，他需要許可。

sentences.english: The king of Zhao intended to make Zhao Kuo a general to lead the troops to fight against Qin.
sentences.chinese: 趙王向派趙括做大將，率領軍隊抗擊秦朝。

sentences.english: But Venezuelans go into the game without their most important player.
sentences.chinese: 但是委內瑞拉人這場比賽將缺陣一員大將。

sentences.english: He is the third general of the Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他是當朝第三的大將軍。

sentences.english: So Emperor Wudi made up his  mind, and appointed Du Yu the Grand General for Conquering the south .
sentences.chinese: 於是司馬炎就下了決心，任命杜預作徵南大將軍。

sentences.english: We admit dunois is a great captain .
sentences.chinese: 我們承認杜諾瓦是一位大將。

sentences.english: In other words, too big a development case will unnecessarily drain money from your project.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，開發案例太大將會不必要地浪費項目的錢。

sentences.english: There will be run-offs in Houston and Atlanta.
sentences.chinese: 休斯頓和亞特蘭大將進行決定性選舉。

definition: Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
fierce general/valiant military leader/fig. brave individual
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
Wei State (407-225 BC), one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Wei State or Cao Wei 曹魏 (220-265), the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms
(of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
